items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's major indexes ended higher on Friday, rebounding from the previous day's sell-off as Amazon's strong earnings countered a significant drop in U.S. job growth in October. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 288.73 points, or 0.69%, to 42,052.19, the S&P 500 gained 23.35 points, or 0.41%, to 5,728.80 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 144.77 points, or 0.80%, to 18,239.92.

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a muted start for the day.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade DMart, Bharat Dynamics, City Union Bank, Gujarat Alkalies, and others on Monday?
items.description: The market is expected to be rangebound as long as it defends last week’s low in the upcoming sessions. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Sun Pharma shares in focus after US court ruling stalls Leqselvi launch
items.description: In the worst-case scenario, an unfavourable judgment would prevent Sun Pharma from launching Leqselvi until the patent expires, delaying its market entry.

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon shares in focus on winning order worth Rs 312.13 crore from MSETCL
items.description: Ashoka Buildcon Share Price |

items.title: NBCC shares in focus after winning multiple orders worth Rs 235 crore
items.description: NBCC Share Price | The share price rose more than 120 percent in the last one-year.

items.title: Agri Picks Report November 04, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, According to the Indian Meteorological Department’s (IMD) monthly long range forecast released on Friday, rainfall over southern peninsular India during November is most likely to be above normal in the ongoing phase of northeast monsoon.

items.title: Live: How will Nifty move this week? | US elections, FOMC outcome in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: Benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty are geared up for a data-packed week, with US elections and US Fed's rate outcome on the radar. Samvat 2081 opened positively for Indian markets, snapping its two-day losing streak. With Nifty down 6 percent last month, can markets reverse trend in November? Experts expect Nifty to face resistance at 24,500, with support around 24,000. This morning global cues are mixed. US markets started November on a strong note, led by tech stocks, while Asian markets were mixed this morning. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Zen Technologies, Apollo Hospitals, and Lokesh Machines. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Ajit Mishra - SVP, Research, Religare Broking and Andrew Holland--CEO, Avendus Capital Public Markets Alternate Strategies LLP.

items.title: Premier Energies stock edges up after subsidiaries bag orders worth Rs 560 crore
items.description: Premier Energies shares rose after its subsidiaries secured Rs 560 crore in solar orders from key IPPs, boosting its solar module and cell pipeline.

items.title: Azad Engineering soars 13% after securing Rs 700 crore contract from Mitsubishi
items.description: The order involves the supply of rotating and stationary airfoils for advanced gas and thermal power turbine engines, aimed at fulfilling Mitsubishi's global demand in the power generation sector.

items.title: NCC stock gains as PSU bags contracts worth Rs 3,496 crore in October
items.description: NCC shares rose after securing Rs 3,496 crore in new contracts across building, electrical, and water divisions, with steady order growth in October.

items.title: Dr Lal PathLabs: Exit of a company veteran stokes investor concerns
items.description: Om Manchanda, managing director of Lal PathLabs is moving on to an advisory role after steering the company for close to two decades

items.title: Bajaj Auto tanks 5% after domestic sales decline in October
items.description: Despite the fall in domestic sales, an increase in monthly exports helped Bajaj Auto register a near 2 percent growth in total sales to 4.79 lakh units in October.

items.title: Buy AIA Engineering; target of Rs 4455: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on AIA Engineering has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 4455 in its research report dated November 04, 2024.

items.title: Ashok Leyland shares dip over 3% on October sales decline
items.description: The company reported total vehicle sales of 15,310 units in October 2024, marking a 9 percent decline compared to 16,864 units in October 2023.

items.title: OMC stocks plunge 5% on bearish Goldman Sachs note; Indian Oil has highest downside risk after Q2 results
items.description: Oil marketing stocks IOC, BPCL, and HPCL fell up to 5% as Goldman Sachs issued a bearish outlook following weak Q2 results, driven by underwhelming refining and marketing performance.

items.title: Goa unit clearance brings cheer for Cipla, lifts earnings visibility
items.description: The clearance of Cipla's Goa facility opens the doors for the launch of Abraxane, which could be a around $120 million opportunity at peak.

items.title: October's 7% cut in Midcap index was steepest in four years: Experts weigh on what next
items.description: India's broader indices BSE MidCap and BSE SmallCap experienced steep corrections in October, declining over 7% and 4%, respectively. This marks the first monthly loss for the broader indices in seven and five months, respectively.

items.title: Gensol Engineering stock jumps 5% on bagging solar PV project worth Rs 780 crore
items.description: Gensol Engineering shares rose as the company secured a Rs 780 crore solar PV project from a public utility in Maharashtra, marking its expanding role in large-scale renewable EPC projects.

items.title: Taj GVK shares jump 8% on 76% jump in Q2FY25 net profit
items.description: The Hyderabad-based company registered a consolidated net profit of Rs 19.65 crore in the second quarter of FY25, up 76.46 percent

items.title: M&M shares surge on record SUV and tractor sales in October
items.description: Following the monthly business update, Kotak Institutional Equities upgraded M&M to a 'Buy' rating from 'Add,' noting the company's continued strength across segments and improved return ratios.

items.title: Exide Industries shares hit 5-month low as Q2 net profit misses estimates
items.description: Exide's shares dropped as much as 4.6% to Rs 437.80 apiece after the results were announced, hitting their lowest since June 4
